channel.title: JAMES Framework Releases
channel.description: Notification of new releases of the JAMES framework for discrete optimization using local search metaheuristics in Java.

item.title: JAMES Extensions and examples version 1.1.1
item.description: Version 1.1.1 of the extensions and examples modules have been released.

item.title: JAMES Version 1.1
item.description: Version 1.1 of the JAMES framework has been released (core, extensions and examples modules).

item.title: JAMES Version 1.0
item.description: Version 1.0 of the JAMES framework has been released (core, extensions and examples modules).

item.title: JAMES Extensions and examples version 0.2.1
item.description: Version 0.2.1 of the extensions and examples modules have been released.

item.title: JAMES Version 0.2
item.description: Version 0.2 of the JAMES framework has been released (core, extensions and examples modules).

item.title: JAMES Version 0.1
item.description: Version 0.1 of the JAMES framework has been released (core, extensions and examples modules).
